name: There's Always Somewhere to Go
description:
This is a WIP and I'm looking for writing feedback at the moment! Expect some color schemes to not be correct and not all images to be in yet.

Play as Sam, fresh in high school and overall not having a great time. To relax, they play a game sent by one of their online friends that gets kind of weird (interesting). They try to learn a bit more about themself and forge a better relationship with their mom.

CW: mentions of parental abuse but not intense, coming out, some body horror imagery for a monster (not in current release, wip)
